description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Uluwatu, Indonesia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Grand Opening: Uluwatu Boutique Suites & Villas with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Free-Flow Cocktail Hour
hotels.description: Discover your slice of paradise at this seaside sanctuary in Uluwatu, where boutique suites and villas sit peacefully on the Island of the Gods. Raw timber, concrete and stone finishes create a cocoon of calm, carried by the ocean breeze and elevated by stylish facilities - including a cliffside spa, refined restaurant and shimmering infinity pool. Savour precision-crafted Japanese cuisine at Tsune Uluwatu, where every dish is a minimalist masterpiece served against a scenic ocean backdrop. At Svaha Spa Bingin, tension dissolves with every tailored treatment as you soak up the rhythm of the sea from a distance. Perfect for couples, this new Balinese jewel provides the perfect launching pad for exploring secret coves by day and glowing skies by dusk, before retreating to a private haven where thoughtful design and quiet indulgence come standard. Unveiled in 2025, this clifftop stay is Uluwatu's newest scene-stealer - and you can be among the first to experience it.

hotels.title: Elevated Alila Uluwatu Private Pool Villas with Cliffside Cabana Bar & World-Class Spa
hotels.description: An unbeatable clifftop location and endless horizon panoramas await at this five-star escape, home to a refined collection of private pool villas offering sophisticated interiors and peaceful seclusion. Make your way to Spa Alila for a transcendent experience using ancient Asian healing techniques, or gaze out over the ocean from The Warung, the onsite restaurant inspired by traditional food stalls. When you're ready to descend from the heavenly clifftops and sink your toes into golden shores, the beach is accessible via an impressive exclusive stairway which hugs the cliffside.

hotels.vendor_name: The Ungasan Cliff Top Resort, Bali
hotels.title: Five-Star Uluwatu Clifftop Luxury with Butler Service & VIP Beach Club Access
hotels.description: Discover a new definition for Balinese indulgence by escaping to The Ungasan Clifftop Resort, a collection of extraordinary suites and villas perched on the cliffs of the Bukit Peninsula. Sitting above Uluwatu’s famous Sundays Beach Club, this luxury resort redefines what it is to be truly relaxed, with a soundtrack of crashing waves and panoramic ocean views as far as the eye can see. Suites and villas celebrate opulence - traditional architectural styles are combined with modern amenities to offer oceanside living at its best. Spend your days lazing by the infinity pool, snacking on local and international delicacies at the Pool Lounge, or head to Sundays Beach Club, where free watersports hire and a VIP seating area await. Enjoy a beachside massage at the Club’s Spa Bale, or venture to indoor Vela Spa, where signature treatments include body scrubs, massages, facials and reflexology. Align your chakras with a private yoga session, or practise your swing on the tennis court or putting green. Villa guests need not leave their plush surroundings - private pools, yoga sessions and in-villa dining come as standard, with floating breakfasts and show-stopping BBQs on offer. **Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights/packages)** - Enjoy a luxurious start to the day with **breakfast served to your suite or villa daily** - Travel in style with **return airport transfers** - Spend your days by the sea with **complimentary access to Sundays Beach Club**, with an exclusive VIP seating area and use of snorkelling and watersports equipment - Don’t bother lifting a finger: **butler service** will look after all your wants and needs - Settle into your sumptuous sanctuary with a **one-time 60-minute treatment per person** at Vela Spa (for stays of 2+ nights) - Enjoy a feast for the senses with **one three-course dinner** served in the comfort of your suite (suite guests only, for stays of 5+ nights) - Get family and friends together for **one in-villa BBQ experience for up to 10 people** (villa guests only, for stays of 5+ nights) **Group villa upgrades available**: Escape with friends and family when you choose one of the spectacular five-bedroom villa upgrades for 10 guests.

hotels.title: Uluwatu Suite Escape with Spectacular Cliffside Pool
hotels.description: Venture to the edge of the world, where every view is of the ocean and secluded luxury is a given: this is Six Senses Uluwatu - a cliffside sanctuary perched on the southernmost tip of Bali, ranked among the top five hotels in Uluwatu on Tripadvisor. Here, a spectacular pool clings to the cliff's edge over three terraced levels, and watching the sun dip towards the glittering ocean is best enjoyed while sipping cocktails. Bali’s only World Green Council-certified resort, Six Senses Uluwatu proudly focuses on recycling, composting and reusing, using sustainable architecture with contemporary Balinese touches. Relax at the blissful spa, rejuvenate your body and soul at the yoga and meditation pavilion, and indulge in farm-to-table sustainable dining at the resort’s two restaurants.

hotels.title: Eclectic Uluwatu Cliffside Retreat with Infinity Pool, Onsite Spa & Restaurant
hotels.description: Feel the sea breeze in your hair as you revel in tropical luxury perched high on the cliffs of Bali's stunning Bukit Peninsula. Savour the flavours of the island at the onsite restaurant, renowned for its fresh seafood and delicious classic dishes. Those seeking relaxation can indulge in a rejuvenating treatment at the onsite spa, or sip on cocktails at Ulu Cliffhouse Beach Club, soaking up the luxurious Palms Springs vibes.
